title: Engraved Pen, Pen...
cleaned_text: The Classic Apple Award features our traditional optic crystal apple sitting atop a black crystal base. The engraving is done on the apple and base of this award. The base is filled with your choice of gold or silver filling. The Classic Apple makes a great trophy and is available to ship anywhere in the USA! This product has our official Best Price Guarantee. We are so confident about our price that if you are able to find this product, decorated with the same process for less anywhere else we will match that price and also give you an additional 5% off. Our goal is to eliminate the stress of shopping for awards by offering the best price, free unlimited engraving, free shipping and no hidden fees. We offer free standard shipping to one USA-based location on orders over $100. We also offer guaranteed delivery on rush orders shipped using premium UPS Air and FedEx Air Priority services anywhere in the USA! Additionally, in an effort to support remote ceremonies, we have introduced a multi-location drop shipping service at a nominal cost. Learn more
